creator: Movie6 Limited
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Hong Kong Movie 3.0!

Hong Kong Movie have everything you need for movie and cinema information.
Movie information, watch trailers, get showtimes and buy tickets.
You can rate and review movies once you have become our verified members.


Feature
- Latest movie information and trailers
- Exclusive original interviews
- Movie showtimes of most cinemas in Hong Kong
- Realtime seat plan status
- Cinema info and their promotions
- Editor choice of movies
- Related movies of actors
- Click to purchase from cinema website
- In-app purchase of MCL Cinemas
- Notification when movie tickets go on sale

Member exclusive features (*)
- Rate movies and write reviews
- Save your favorite movies, cinemas and movie lists
- Screenings and other events

Support cinema circuits (**)
- UA
- MCL
- Broadway
- Golden Harvest
- Newport
- AMC
- Cinema City
- Emperor Cinema
- CGV
- L Cinema
- Lumen Cinema
- CineArt

*Some features require SMS verification

descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Hong Kong Movie 6.0!

Hong Kong Movie is proud to present to our users a large variety of movie and cinematic information!
View the latest movie information, exclusive interviews and movie showtimes in Hong Kong. Once you become a verified user, you will be able to write reviews and leave ratings to interact with other users!

Features
- Latest movie information and trailers
- Exclusive & unique interviews
- Display movie showtimes of most cinemas in Hong Kong
- Realtime seat plan status
- Cinema information and promotions
- Editor’s movies recommendation
- View a list of movies by searching actor’s name
- Click to purchase from the cinema’s ticketing website
- In-app purchase for MCL Cinemas
- Receive notifications when new movies go on air!
- Use in conjunction with Golden Scene Cinema membership features to enjoy exclusive member discounts!

Member exclusive features (*)
